typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrc
empsrc window(over(JOBNAME = JOB),
	desc(toInteger(SAL), true),
	RANK = rank(),
		DENSE_RANK = denseRank(),
		LEAD = lead(SAL),
		LAG = lag(SAL),
		CUMM_SAL = sum(toInteger(SAL))) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['window.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
